# Changelog

# v1.1.0

Forked from [link](https://github.com/nanobox-io/golang-scribble)

**Enhancements**

* Added `go.mod` nad `go.sum` files
* Updated to `go 1.19`
* Switched logger to `logrus`
* Split code into sub files.
* Added `CHANGELOG.md` file
* Added `Makefile` file.
* Added simple race condition test.

**Other**
* Updated LICENSE
* Updated README.md
